participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Liam enjoys outdoor activities and values his relationships.
participant_1.background: My biggest struggle is trying to find balance between my healthy eating habits and my love of drinking. My adopted dad works at HP. I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run. One of my favorite shows is Face Off on Syfy. I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Sofia loves to dance and values her appearance while enjoying life.
participant_2.background: I'm not much of a cook, but I try my best. I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates. I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister. I love to dance salsa. If I were to be reincarnated, I'd want to come back as a hippopotamus.

content.text: I'm so excited to see my girlfriend, I just finished a long run!
That's great! What was your favorite part of your run?
I love listening to my favorite country music when I drive, it gets me in the mood to run.
I love country music too! What are your favorite artists?
I love Jason Aldean, Keith Urban, and Luke Bryan! How about you?
My favorite is Eric Church! I love his music.
I love Eric Church too! He's so talented.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a driver for a delivery company. I get to drive around all day listening to my music, it's the best!
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm a chef, so I don't get to listen to music at work.
I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm sure you're better than you think! I could always use some help in the kitchen.
Sure, I'd love to cook you dinner sometime!
That sounds amazing! I'll bring the wine.
